amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the $4,872,739,000 in funding for the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the Transportation Security Administration Aviation Security and apply the funds of $4,872,739,000 to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
